title: Our Hollow Bones
description: The thrilling second installment to the Forged Trilogy...The flame will rise to kill the darkness.Dreams had tricked her before. Maeve struggles with the realizations of her past and present whilst finding herself in the clutches of a new enemy. Though tensions are rising in the Five Kingdoms, the feathered line between good and evil may be even blurrier than ever imagined.The treacherous acts of her past haunt Maeve as she fights to find the balance between the old and the new, as the Freed Fae work to dismantle the Five Kingdoms and everything she thought she knew was real. Betrayal and twists beyond her wildest dreams may turn the tides of her fate forever.With a newfound purpose, Maeve must heal the scars of her forgotten life, liberate those threatened by darkness, and decide what role she will play in the future of Ignisiem.TW:Violence, child abuse (memory), blood, gore, graphic sex, childhood trauma, torture, minor body shaming (memory), betrayal, dubious sexual situation, death. Please only read this book if you're eighteen or older. Thank you!
author: Shelby Cuaron
